Articles.Content: I nuke the centre of the galaxy. my hill.

> 
> I nuke the centre of the galaxy. my hill.

[Wrong thread]

Me: Next!

complaining delegate: I really need to see the council soon, our world is being severely assaulted by unknown assailants.

Me: Alright, I'll write you in for...\*looks through Council planning calendar\* first Tuesday of next month.

Complaining delegate: But our worlds are being attacked NOW!

Me: LOOK! The council is very busy, and these reports have been through a thousand times over in the past week. If you can provide any new information that can help us identify the assailants, We would be more than happy to grant you an earlier hearing...

Complaining delegate: But...

Me: NEXT!
I have a new hidden base in the clouds of Jool.
We should arrange a first responder something-or-other fleet to deal with problems like that.
I'll build it!
I vote for the new first responders.

15 Titan-Class destroyers

2 Heavy Transports

4 Light Transports

45 Ligntning-Class Fighters
\*groan\* Being the council Liaison is harder than I thought it would be...

It's authorized. As I'm the leader of the military, I give you the right to command the first-responders.

- - - Updated - - -

Hey, I have to keep the peace.
That should be the main responder fleet. If things get worse, Sampa or I can send our flagships.
My job's pretty hard.
I'm head of R&D
yeah, you get to keep the peace in the galaxy, but I have to create order from chaos at the DOORS of the council chamber itself!
oh right. Also, R&D has been given the objective to upgrade my Particle Shield.
We'll need some data on it.

The particles move so fast they shred solid objects into nothing, and they absorb energy and redistribute it across the entire shield. It requires it's own fusion reactor to run. it's practically invincible. Also, explosives meet the same fate as solid objects.

- - - Updated - - -

There.
I have developed a shield that uses a toroidal magnetic field filled with plasma surrounded with a second magnetic field. The plasma is so hot that any projectile is melted and lasers are absorbed.
Btw, be ready, you've got at least a hundred complaints of mysterious attacks on different colonies by unknown attackers headed your way over the next few weeks.

Can you enhance my shield?

- - - Updated - - -

I'll send my third-in-command to deal with the problems as they arise.

I have enhanced it so that the particles are now heavy hydrogen in a constant state of fusion.

- - - Updated - - -

Contained by a magnetic field
Nice.

ALERT: PROXIMITY WARNING

We have a large number of ships incoming to the Citadel! Man battle stations!

> 
> Can you enhance my shield?
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> I'll send my third-in-command to deal with the problems as they arise.

ok, say, I also got a notice from Cerberus scientists, they want to try and combine our Quantum shielding with your particle shield. They just need approval. And, I just received a notice that the Cerberus admiralty is having its first meeting to discuss my court martial.

Again? I activate the defensive mines and wipe out the fleet.

- - - Updated - - -

Also, I like the idea of a super-shield.
